Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class SchoolBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.SchoolBoard
public class SchoolBoard extends Object
This Class represent the SchoolBoard, the space where a Player has their students, controlled professors and towers
